Additional information: Reccommended variety is:Sariab 92
AgroEcological Zone Description: Highland Balochistan is located in the north central part of the province. It has a continental semi-arid climate with hot summers and cold winters. The most limiting factor for crop production in rain-fed areas of the highlands is the low rainfall and its skewed distribution both in terms of time and space. Annual rainfall ranges from 175 to 200 mm in the southern districts of Khuzdar, Mastung and Kalat
AgroEcological Zone Practices: Crop production in non-irrigated areas is totally dependent on rainfall while the main source of irrigation water in the valley floor is tube-wells, karezes and mountains springs. Fruit orchards and vegetables are the major cash crops growing of irrigated lands. Vegetables not only provide protein, vitamins, carbohydrates and roughages to human diet as a nutrition source but are also important source of farm income.
AgroEcological Zone Units: Upper rainfed balochistan include Quetta, Khuzdar, Mastung and Kalat etc.
Comments En: Rainfed: To better utilize the Monsoon rains use deep cultivator once to store the
Comments ES: Secano: Para utilizar mejor las lluvias del monzón utilizan cultivador profunda una vez para almacenar la
Comments FR: Pluvial: Pour mieux utiliser les pluies de mousson utilisent cultivateur en profondeur une fois pour stocker les
Comments ZH: 雨养：要更好地利用季风降雨使用深中耕一次，以存储

Additional information: Reccommended varieties are:Zarghoon 79, Zarlashta 99, Zameendar 80, Raskoh 06
AgroEcological Zone Description: These are the areas where there is proper irrigation systems.
AgroEcological Zone Practices: In irrigated areas of the province, trees are grown simultaneously with agricultural crops and contribute substantially towards household income through sale of timber and firewood. In addition to these major products, forest flora are traditionally used for number of other minor products including agricultural implements, medicines, and different kinds of fruits and nuts.
AgroEcological Zone Units: Thirty-five (35) easily accessible fields/units are working in the province where the staff headed by an Assistant Agricultural Engineer is permanently stationed to serve the farmers by providing services of bulldozers
Comments En: After every rain apply simple cultivation so that the weeds could be removed and moisture stored. Sowing should be through drill. The ratio of nitrogen and phosphorus fertilizer should be from 1:1 to 1:1.5
Comments ES: Después de cada lluvia aplicar cultivo simple de modo que las malas hierbas pueden ser retirados y humedad almacenada. La siembra debe ser a través del taladro. La proporción de nitrógeno y fertilizante de fósforo debe ser de 1: 1 a 1: 1,5
Comments FR: Après chaque pluie appliquer la culture simple afin que les mauvaises herbes peuvent être enlevées et l'humidité stockées. Semer doit se faire par forage. Le rapport de l'azote et de l'engrais de phosphore doit être entre 1: 1 à 1: 1,5
Comments ZH: 每次雨后将简单的培养，使杂草可以被删除并保存水分。播种应通过演练。氮和磷的肥料的比例应该是从1：1至1：1.5

AgroEcological Zone Description: As its name indicates, it is located in the upper part of sindh province. In Upper Sindh, the thermal equator passes through Sindh. The highest temperature recorded was 127 Degrees F in 1919. The air is generally very dry. In winter frost is common
AgroEcological Zone Practices: Mix cropping with good cotton crops.
AgroEcological Zone Units: Major cities of upper sindh are: Rohri, Sukkur, Jacobabad, Thul, Kashmore,Shikarpur etc.
Comments En: In irrigated areas the whole amount of phosphorus and half amount of nitrogen fertilizer should be given at the time of sowing and other half nitrogen should be given at the time of first or second irrigation.
Comments ES: En las zonas de regadío toda la cantidad de fósforo y media cantidad de fertilizante de nitrógeno se debe dar en el momento de la siembra y la otra mitad de nitrógeno deben administrarse en el momento de la primera o segunda irrigación.
Comments FR: Dans les zones irriguées la quantité totale de phosphore et de la quantité de la moitié des engrais azotés devrait être donné au moment de l'ensemencement et d'autres azote moitié devraient être données au moment de la première ou la deuxième irrigation.

AgroEcological Zone Description: The Lower Sindh is effected by the coastline and is damper, humid, SW winds in summer and NE winds in winter and generally the climate is maritime with rainfall little less than the Middle Sindh. The maximum temperature reaches 95-100 Degrees F. In the Kirthar range at 6,000 ft and higher on the Gorakhnath and other peaks in Dadu district, temperatures near freezing have been recorded and brief snow fall is received in winters.
AgroEcological Zone Practices: Lower Sindh has a damper and humid maritime climate affected by the south-western winds in summer and north-eastern winds in winter and with lower rainfall than central Sindh.
Comments En: In irrigated areas the whole amount of phosphorus and half amount of nitrogen fertilizer should be given at the time of sowing and other half nitrogen should be given at the time of first or second irrigation.
Comments ES: En las zonas de regadío toda la cantidad de fósforo y media cantidad de fertilizante de nitrógeno se debe dar en el momento de la siembra y la otra mitad de nitrógeno deben administrarse en el momento de la primera o segunda irrigación.
Comments FR: Dans les zones irriguées la quantité totale de phosphore et de la quantité de la moitié des engrais azotés devrait être donné au moment de l'ensemencement et d'autres azote moitié devraient être données au moment de la première ou la deuxième irrigation.

AgroEcological Zone Description: The lower indus plain covers the area of southern irrigated plain. Soil is fertile and agriculture is strong.
AgroEcological Zone Practices: Southern Irrigated Plain, the Lower Indus Plain. The climate is arid and subtropical. The mean monthly summer rainfall is 18 mm in the north and 45 to 55 mm in the south. The soils are silty and sandy loam but the upper areas of the flood plain are calcareous loamy and clayey. Cotton, wheat and sugar cane are grown on the left bank of the Indus and rice, wheat and gram on the right bank.
AgroEcological Zone Units: Rahimyarkhan, Bahawalpur, Multan. Also some parts of sindh.

AgroEcological Zone Description: The Lower Sindh is effected by the coastline and is damper, humid, SW winds in summer and NE winds in winter and generally the climate is maritime with rainfall little less than the Middle Sindh. The maximum temperature reaches 95-100 Degrees F. In the Kirthar range at 6,000 ft and higher on the Gorakhnath and other peaks in Dadu district, temperatures near freezing have been recorded and brief snow fall is received in winters.
AgroEcological Zone Practices: Lower Sindh has a damper and humid maritime climate affected by the south-western winds in summer and north-eastern winds in winter and with lower rainfall than central Sindh.
Comments En: Before sowing oat, one bag of DAP and one bag of urea mixed together should be applied per acre. In irrigated areas one bag of DAP and half bag of urea should be given at the time of sowing while half bag of urea should be given at the time of first or second irrigation.
Comments ES: Antes de avena siembra, una bolsa de DAP y una bolsa de urea mezclados se deben aplicar por acre. En las zonas de regadío una bolsa de DAP y media bolsa de urea debe darse en el momento de la siembra mientras que la mitad bolsa de urea debe darse en el momento de primera o segunda irrigación.
Comments FR: Avant d'avoine de semis, un sac de DAP et un sac d'urée mélangés doivent être appliquées par acre. Dans les zones irriguées un sac de DAP et le sac moitié de l'urée doit être administré au moment du semis tandis que la moitié de l'urée sac doit être administré au moment de la première ou de la seconde irrigation.
Comments ZH: 播种燕麦之前，DAP的一个袋和尿素混合在一起的一个袋应每英亩施加。在灌溉地区磷酸二铵和尿素的半袋的一个袋应在播种的时候给予而尿素的半袋应该在第一或第二冲洗的时间给出。

Comments En: Sowing and harvesting of potato seed is very to prevent it from Virus vector Reccommended varieties for potato: Diamant, Patrones, Desiree, Cardinal, Ultimus, Sante, Kirn, Raja,Symfonia, SH 5Fertilizer application is very important for potato crop. Reccommended amount for fertilizer use is: Nitrogen: 250 Kg/ha Phosphorus: 125 Kg/ha Pottash: 125 Kg/ha Half of nitrogen should be applied at the time of sowing and other half at the time of adding soil.

Comments ZH: 播种马铃薯种子的收获是非常以防止病毒载体Reccommended品种马铃薯：钻石，Patrones，西瑞，红衣主教，Ultimus公司，三特索，基恩，拉贾，Symfonia，SH 5Fertilizer应用是马铃薯作物非常重要。肥料使用Reccommended量是：氮：250公斤/公顷磷125公斤/公顷Pottash 125公斤/公顷氮的一半应在播种和另一半的时间在添加土壤的时间来施加。

AgroEcological Zone Description: This covers the Salt Range and the Potwar Plateau. The climate of this zone is semi-arid with hot summers.
AgroEcological Zone Practices: This covers the Salt Range and the Potwar Plateau. In the North the mean monthly rainfall is 200 mm in summer and 35 to 50 mm in winter. The climate in the Southern part is semi-arid and hot. The mean monthly rainfall is 85 mm in summer and 30 to 45 mm in winter. The main crops are wheat, millet, oilseed and pulses.
AgroEcological Zone Units: Pothowar region, D.I Khan, Islamabad, Rawalpindi. Mostly rainfed agriculture prevails.
Comments En: Rainfed. To fulfill the need of Nitrogen and Phosphorus of lentil, one bag of DAP or NPK (8:23:18) 2 bags per acre at the time of sowing should be used.
Comments ES: Secano. Para satisfacer la necesidad de nitrógeno y fósforo de lenteja, una bolsa de DAP o NPK (08:23:18) 2 bolsas por acre en el momento de la siembra debe ser utilizado.
Comments FR: Pluvial. Pour répondre à la nécessité de l'azote et du phosphore de lentilles, un sac de DAP ou NPK (08:23:18) 2 sacs par acre au moment du semis doit être utilisé.
Comments ZH: 雨养。为了实现氮和扁豆的磷，磷酸二铵或氮磷钾的一个袋子的需要（8时23分18秒），应使用2袋每亩播种的时间。

Additional information: Reccommended varieties are Sheraz-96, NIAB Masoor-2002 (Second season). First Season, Reccommended variety is NIAB Masoor 2002 for Upper Balochistan areas.
AgroEcological Zone Description: Highland Balochistan is located in the north central part of the province. It has a continental semi-arid climate with hot summers and cold winters. The most limiting factor for crop production in rain-fed areas of the highlands is the low rainfall and its skewed distribution both in terms of time and space. Annual rainfall ranges from 175 to 200 mm in the southern districts of Khuzdar, Mastung and Kalat
AgroEcological Zone Practices: Crop production in non-irrigated areas is totally dependent on rainfall while the main source of irrigation water in the valley floor is tube-wells, karezes and mountains springs. Fruit orchards and vegetables are the major cash crops growing of irrigated lands. Vegetables not only provide protein, vitamins, carbohydrates and roughages to human diet as a nutrition source but are also important source of farm income.
AgroEcological Zone Units: Upper rainfed balochistan include Quetta, Khuzdar, Mastung and Kalat etc.
Comments En: Removal of weeds at the early stage (at the time of sowing) is very essential. Following steps can be taken to ensure removal of weeds.1. Cultivate the field before sowing. 2. Rotery should be used between the furrows (rows) 3. Lentil crop should not be planted with chick pea.
Comments ES: La eliminación de las malas hierbas en la primera etapa (en el momento de la siembra) es muy esencial. los pasos siguientes pueden ser tomadas para asegurar la eliminación de weeds.1. Cultivar el campo antes de la siembra. 2. Rotery se debe utilizar entre los surcos (filas) 3. cultivo de lenteja no debe ser plantado con garbanzo.
Comments FR: L'élimination des mauvaises herbes au stade précoce (au moment du semis) est essentiel. Les étapes suivantes peuvent être prises pour assurer l'élimination des weeds.1. Cultiver le terrain avant le semis. 2. Rotery doit être utilisé entre les sillons (lignes) 3. cultures Lentil ne doit pas être planté de pois chiches.
Comments ZH: 在早期阶段（在播种的时候）杂草的去除是非常必要的。可以采取以下措施来确保去除weeds.1的。播种前培养领域。 2. Rotery应沟（行）之间可以使用3.扁豆作物不应该与鹰嘴豆种植。

Comments En: Pod Borer is one of the dangerous insects of chick-pea. It attacks normally in March. Karate 25 EC at the rate of 250 ml per acre mixed in 80-90 litre water should be applied.

Comments En: Distance between the rows should be 20 inches and the distance between the plants should be 16-20 inches. Farm yard manure should be applied in amount of 20 tonnes per acre, nitrogen 46 Kg/acre, Phosphorus 23 Kg/acre and Pottash 25 Kg/acre. Gap between irrigations should be 7 days.
Comments ES: Distancia entre las hileras debe ser de 20 pulgadas y la distancia entre las plantas debe ser de 16-20 pulgadas. Granja patio estiércol se debe aplicar en una cantidad de 20 toneladas por acre, nitrógeno 46 Kg / acre, fósforo 23 Kg / acre y Pottash 25 Kg / acre. Brecha entre riegos debe ser de 7 días.
Comments FR: Distance entre les lignes doit être de 20 pouces et la distance entre les plantes doit être 16-20 pouces. fumier de ferme doit être appliquée en quantité de 20 tonnes par acre, azote 46 kg / acre, phosphore 23 kg / acre et Pottash 25 kg / acre. Écart entre les irrigations devrait être de 7 jours.
Comments ZH: 各行之间的距离应为20英寸，植物之间的距离应在16-20英寸。农场厩肥应在每英亩20吨，氮46公斤/英亩，磷23公斤/英亩和Pottash 25公斤/英亩的量施加。灌溉差距应该是7天。

Comments ES: Distancia entre las hileras debe ser de 20 pulgadas y la distancia entre las plantas debe ser de 16-20 pulgadas. Granja patio estiércol se debe aplicar en una cantidad de 20 toneladas por acre, nitrógeno 46 Kg / acre, fósforo 23 Kg / acre y Pottash 25 Kg / acre. Brecha entre riegos debe ser de 7 días.
Comments FR: Distance entre les lignes doit être de 20 pouces et la distance entre les plantes doit être 16-20 pouces. fumier de ferme doit être appliquée en quantité de 20 tonnes par acre, azote 46 kg / acre, phosphore 23 kg / acre et Pottash 25 kg / acre. Écart entre les irrigations devrait être de 7 jours.
Comments ZH: 各行之间的距离应为20英寸，植物之间的距离应在16-20英寸。农场厩肥应在每英亩20吨，氮46公斤/英亩，磷23公斤/英亩和Pottash 25公斤/英亩的量施加。灌溉差距应该是7天。

Additional information: Reccommended varieties are Sherali,Dunkald, Rainbow, Oscer, Raya, Pakola
AgroEcological Zone Description: Highland Balochistan is located in the north central part of the province. It has a continental semi-arid climate with hot summers and cold winters. The most limiting factor for crop production in rain-fed areas of the highlands is the low rainfall and its skewed distribution both in terms of time and space. Annual rainfall ranges from 175 to 200 mm in the southern districts of Khuzdar, Mastung and Kalat
AgroEcological Zone Practices: Crop production in non-irrigated areas is totally dependent on rainfall while the main source of irrigation water in the valley floor is tube-wells, karezes and mountains springs. Fruit orchards and vegetables are the major cash crops growing of irrigated lands. Vegetables not only provide protein, vitamins, carbohydrates and roughages to human diet as a nutrition source but are also important source of farm income.
AgroEcological Zone Units: Upper rainfed balochistan include Quetta, Khuzdar, Mastung and Kalat etc.
Comments En: Rainfed: In normal cases one bag of DAP and one bag of urea per acre should be applied. Latest research has shown that the use of Pottash allows crop to fight against drought and diseases. So one bag of pottash should be applied per acre. In rainfed areas all the fertilizers should be used at the time of preparing field for planting.
Comments ES: Secano: En casos normales una bolsa de DAP y una bolsa de urea por acre deben aplicarse. Las últimas investigaciones han demostrado que el uso de Pottash permite cultivos para luchar contra la sequía y las enfermedades. Así que una bolsa de pottash debe ser aplicada por acre. En las zonas de secano todos los fertilizantes deben ser utilizados en el momento de la preparación de terreno para la siembra.
Comments FR: Pluvial: Dans les cas normaux, un sac de DAP et un sac d'urée par acre doivent être appliquées. Les dernières recherches ont montré que l'utilisation de Pottash permet la culture de lutte contre la sécheresse et aux maladies. Donc, un sac de pottash doit être appliqué par acre. Dans les zones non irriguées tous les engrais doivent être utilisés au moment de la préparation champ pour la plantation.
Comments ZH: 雨育：在正常情况下，DAP的一个包和每英亩尿素的一个袋应适用。最新的研究表明，使用Pottash允许作物抗旱和疾病作斗争。所以pottash的一个塑料袋应每亩施用。在旱作地区所有的化肥应在现场准备种植时使用。

Additional information: Reccommended varieties are Sherali,Dunkald, Rainbow,Oscer, Raya and Pakola
AgroEcological Zone Description: This covers the Salt Range and the Potwar Plateau. The climate of this zone is semi-arid with hot summers.
AgroEcological Zone Practices: This covers the Salt Range and the Potwar Plateau. In the North the mean monthly rainfall is 200 mm in summer and 35 to 50 mm in winter. The climate in the Southern part is semi-arid and hot. The mean monthly rainfall is 85 mm in summer and 30 to 45 mm in winter. The main crops are wheat, millet, oilseed and pulses.
AgroEcological Zone Units: Pothowar region, D.I Khan, Islamabad, Rawalpindi. Mostly rainfed agriculture prevails.
Comments En: Mustard crop needs 12-15 inches of water, which can be fulfilled by 3-4 irrigations (waters) First water should be given between 30-35 days of planting, second water should be given at flowering stage and the third water should be given when the seed starts forming.
Comments ES: cultivo de la mostaza necesita 12-15 pulgadas de agua, que pueden ser cumplidas por 3-4 de riego (aguas) Primera agua debe administrarse entre 30-35 días de la siembra, segundo el agua debe ser dado en la etapa de floración y la tercera agua se debe dar cuando la semilla empieza a formar.
Comments FR: besoins des cultures de moutarde 12-15 pouces d'eau, qui peuvent être remplies par 3-4 irrigations (eaux) l'eau doit être d'abord donné entre 30-35 jours de plantation, deuxième eau doit être donnée au stade floraison et la troisième eau devrait être donnée lorsque la semence commence à se former.
Comments ZH: 芥末作物需水12-15英寸，这可以通过3-4灌溉（水）履行应种植30-35天之间给予一是水，二次供水应在开花期和第三水体应给予给予种子开始时形成。

Additional information: Irrigated and rainfed areas
Comments En: Mustard should be planted with the help of drill. Drill used for sowing wheat should be filled with 2 Kg mustard seed and 38 Kg TSP or DAP or put dry sand of same amount in it and then plant the crop.
Comments ES: Mostaza se deben plantar con la ayuda del taladro. Taladro utilizado para el trigo de siembra debe ser llenado con 2 Kg de semilla de mostaza y 38 Kg TSP o DAP o poner arena seca de misma cantidad en ella y luego plantar el cultivo.
Comments FR: La moutarde doit être planté avec l'aide de forage. Semoir occasion pour le blé de semis doit être rempli avec 2 kg de graines de moutarde et 38 kg TSP ou DAP ou mettre du sable sec de même montant, puis planter la culture.
Comments ZH: 芥末应种植带钻的帮助。电钻用于播种小麦应该充满2公斤芥菜籽和38公斤TSP或DAP或放在它相同量的干砂，然后种植作物。

AgroEcological Zone Description: As its name indicates, it is located in the upper part of sindh province. In Upper Sindh, the thermal equator passes through Sindh. The highest temperature recorded was 127 Degrees F in 1919. The air is generally very dry. In winter frost is common
AgroEcological Zone Practices: Mix cropping with good cotton crops.
AgroEcological Zone Units: Major cities of upper sindh are: Rohri, Sukkur, Jacobabad, Thul, Kashmore,Shikarpur etc.
Comments En: Mostly irrigation applied.
Comments ES: Sobre todo de riego aplicada.
Comments FR: La plupart du temps l'irrigation appliquée.
Comments ZH: 晴灌溉应用。

Additional information: Both irrigated and rainfed areas.
AgroEcological Zone Description: The Lower Sindh is effected by the coastline and is damper, humid, SW winds in summer and NE winds in winter and generally the climate is maritime with rainfall little less than the Middle Sindh. The maximum temperature reaches 95-100 Degrees F. In the Kirthar range at 6,000 ft and higher on the Gorakhnath and other peaks in Dadu district, temperatures near freezing have been recorded and brief snow fall is received in winters.
AgroEcological Zone Practices: Lower Sindh has a damper and humid maritime climate affected by the south-western winds in summer and north-eastern winds in winter and with lower rainfall than central Sindh.
Comments En: Mostly irrigation applied.
Comments ES: Sobre todo de riego aplicada.
Comments FR: La plupart du temps l'irrigation appliquée.
Comments ZH: 晴灌溉应用。

Additional information: Both Irrigated and rainfed areas produce Sesame. Reccommended varieties are Punjab Til (sesame)-90, Punjab Til (sesame)-89, TS-3 P 37-40 and S-17
AgroEcological Zone Description: This covers the Salt Range and the Potwar Plateau. The climate of this zone is semi-arid with hot summers.
AgroEcological Zone Practices: This covers the Salt Range and the Potwar Plateau. In the North the mean monthly rainfall is 200 mm in summer and 35 to 50 mm in winter. The climate in the Southern part is semi-arid and hot. The mean monthly rainfall is 85 mm in summer and 30 to 45 mm in winter. The main crops are wheat, millet, oilseed and pulses.
AgroEcological Zone Units: Pothowar region, D.I Khan, Islamabad, Rawalpindi. Mostly rainfed agriculture prevails.
Comments En: Sandy soil is required for planting Sesame with good amount of moisture in the soil. After irrigation when soil is in watter conditions, cultivation is required for soil preperation. Planting should be in rows. The distance between the rows should be 45-60 cm. The depth of seed should not be more than 2 inches so that the crop can be grown quickly.
Comments ES: Se requiere de suelos de arena para sésamo siembra con buena cantidad de humedad en el suelo. Después de riego cuando el suelo está en condiciones watter, se requiere el cultivo de preparacion del suelo. La siembra debe estar en filas. La distancia entre las filas debe ser de 45-60 cm. La profundidad de la semilla no debe ser más de 2 pulgadas de modo que el cultivo se puede cultivar rápidamente.
Comments FR: Le sol sablonneux est nécessaire pour la plantation de sésame avec une bonne quantité d'humidité dans le sol. Après l'irrigation lorsque le sol est dans des conditions de Watter, la culture est nécessaire pour preperation du sol. La plantation doit être en rangées. La distance entre les lignes doit être 45-60 cm. La profondeur des semences ne devrait pas être plus de 2 pouces pour que la culture peut être cultivée rapidement.
Comments ZH: 沙质土壤需要与土壤中的良好的水分，种植芝麻。灌水后土壤时，在瓦尔特的条件下，需要土壤水面浮油栽培。种植应该是行。行之间的距离应为45-60厘米。种子的深度不宜不只两英寸，使作物能够迅速成长。

Additional information: Both rainfed and irrigated
AgroEcological Zone Description: As its name indicates, it is located in the upper part of sindh province. In Upper Sindh, the thermal equator passes through Sindh. The highest temperature recorded was 127 Degrees F in 1919. The air is generally very dry. In winter frost is common
AgroEcological Zone Practices: Mix cropping with good cotton crops.
AgroEcological Zone Units: Major cities of upper sindh are: Rohri, Sukkur, Jacobabad, Thul, Kashmore,Shikarpur etc.
Comments En: Fertilizer use per acre is as follows: At the time of planting either one bag of DAP plus half bag of urea OR one bag of Nitrofos plus half bag of urea should be applied. At the time of first irrigation, half bag of urea should be applied per acre.
Comments ES: El uso de fertilizantes por acre es el siguiente: En el momento de la siembra o bien una bolsa de DAP más la mitad de la bolsa de urea o una bolsa de Nitrofos más la mitad de la bolsa de urea se debe aplicar. En el momento de primer riego, media bolsa de urea se debe aplicar por acre.
Comments FR: L'utilisation des engrais par acre est le suivant: Au moment de la plantation, soit un sac de DAP et de la moitié sac d'urée ou d'un sac de Nitrofos plus la moitié de sac d'urée doit être appliqué. Au moment de la première irrigation, moitié d'un sac d'urée doit être appliquée par acre.
Comments ZH: 每亩化肥使用方法如下：在种植要么磷酸二铵一袋尿素加半袋或Nitrofos一袋尿素加半袋时应当适用。起初灌溉时，尿素的半袋应每亩施用。

AgroEcological Zone Description: These are the areas where there is proper irrigation systems.
AgroEcological Zone Practices: In irrigated areas of the province, trees are grown simultaneously with agricultural crops and contribute substantially towards household income through sale of timber and firewood. In addition to these major products, forest flora are traditionally used for number of other minor products including agricultural implements, medicines, and different kinds of fruits and nuts.
AgroEcological Zone Units: Thirty-five (35) easily accessible fields/units are working in the province where the staff headed by an Assistant Agricultural Engineer is permanently stationed to serve the farmers by providing services of bulldozers

Additional information: Spring Planting: Reccommended varieties are: Early maturing: BL-4, L-116 BF-162, CP 43-33, Cp 72-2086, CP 77-400, SPSG-26, CPF-237 Mid season: Triton, COL-54, SPF-213 Late Maturing: L-118, COJ-84 Fall Planting also practiced successfully.
AgroEcological Zone Description: 31°21′52″N 72°59′40″E / 31.36444. Central punjab is rich in agricultural practices and a good part of economy depends on agriculture.
AgroEcological Zone Practices: Irrigation. Mix cropping system. Major wheat- and cotton-producing area
Comments En: Irrigation. For a good crop of sugarcane approximately 64 to 72 inches/acre water is needed per year. Apart from rain, 15 - 18 waters(irrigations) are required for a good crop yield of sugarcane. Depending on the weather conditions, the gap between irrigations in April should be 12 -14 days, in may and june it should be 8 - 10 days, in July August it should be 12 - 15 days in September and october it should be 15- 20 days and from November to february the gap between irrigations should be 25 - 30 days.
Comments ES: Irrigación. Para una buena cosecha de caña de azúcar de aproximadamente 64 a 72 pulgadas / agua es necesaria acre por año. Aparte de la lluvia, 15 - Se requieren 18 (aguas de riego) para un rendimiento buena cosecha de caña de azúcar. Dependiendo de las condiciones climáticas, la brecha entre riegos en abril debe ser de 12 a 14 días, en mayo y junio debería ser de 8 - 10 días, en Julio Agosto debería ser 12 - 15 días en septiembre y octubre que debería ser 15- 20 días y de noviembre a febrero la brecha entre riegos debe ser de 25 - 30 días.
Comments FR: Irrigation. Pour une bonne récolte de la canne à sucre d'environ 64 à 72 pouces / eau acres par an sont nécessaires. En dehors de la pluie, 15 - 18 eaux (irrigations) sont nécessaires pour un bon rendement des cultures de canne à sucre. En fonction des conditions météorologiques, l'écart entre les irrigations en Avril devrait être 12 à 14 jours, en mai et en juin, il devrait être 8 - 10 jours, en Juillet Août il devrait être 12 - 15 jours en Septembre et octobre, il devrait être 15 20 jours et de Novembre à février l'écart entre les irrigations devrait être 25 - 30 jours.
Comments ZH: 灌溉。对于甘蔗的好收成大约64到72英寸/每年每亩需水。除了下雨，15  -  18水（灌溉）所需要的甘蔗良好的作物产量。根据天气情况，在四月灌溉之间的间隙应为12日 -  14日，在五月和六月应该是8  -  10天，于七月八月应该是12  -  15天九，十月份应该是15〜 20天，从十一月到二月灌溉之间的差距应在25  -  30天。

Additional information: Spring Planting: Reccommended varieties are: Early maturing: BL-4, L-116 BF-162, CP 43-33, Cp 72-2086, CP 77-400, SPSG-26, CPF-237 Mid season: Triton, COL-54, SPF-213 Late Maturing: L-118, COJ-84 Fall Planting also practiced successfully.
Comments En: Irrigation should be stopped one month prior to harvesting.
Comments ES: El riego debe ser detenido un mes antes de la cosecha.
Comments FR: L'irrigation doit être arrêté un mois avant la récolte.
Comments ZH: 灌溉，应当在一个月之前，收获停止。

Comments En: Fertilization in canal irrigated areas should be as follows: one bag urea and one bag DAP, all DAP at sowing and half urea at sowing and half at first irrigation. Like other oilseed crops, it should be sown in lines. In irrigated areas the line to line distance should be 45 cm (1.5 ft)
Comments ES: La fertilización en el canal irrigada áreas deben ser como sigue: una urea bolsa y una DAP bolsa, todo DAP a la siembra y media de urea a la siembra y la media en primer riego. Al igual que otros cultivos de semillas oleaginosas, se debe sembrar en líneas. En las áreas de riego de la línea a distancia en línea debe ser de 45 cm (1,5 pies)
Comments FR: Engrais à canal zones irriguées doivent être les suivantes: une urée de sac et un sac DAP, tout DAP et de l'urée au moment du semis de la moitié au semis et la moitié au premier irrigation. Comme d'autres cultures oléagineuses, il devrait être semée en lignes. Dans les zones irriguées de la ligne à distance en ligne devrait être de 45 cm (1,5 ft)

AgroEcological Zone Description: This covers the Salt Range and the Potwar Plateau. The climate of this zone is semi-arid with hot summers.
AgroEcological Zone Practices: This covers the Salt Range and the Potwar Plateau. In the North the mean monthly rainfall is 200 mm in summer and 35 to 50 mm in winter. The climate in the Southern part is semi-arid and hot. The mean monthly rainfall is 85 mm in summer and 30 to 45 mm in winter. The main crops are wheat, millet, oilseed and pulses.
AgroEcological Zone Units: Pothowar region, D.I Khan, Islamabad, Rawalpindi. Mostly rainfed agriculture prevails.

Additional information: Summer crop: Mostly rainfed. Reccommended varieties are Garlic pink, Garlic white and chinese garlic.
AgroEcological Zone Description: This covers the Salt Range and the Potwar Plateau. The climate of this zone is semi-arid with hot summers.
AgroEcological Zone Practices: This covers the Salt Range and the Potwar Plateau. In the North the mean monthly rainfall is 200 mm in summer and 35 to 50 mm in winter. The climate in the Southern part is semi-arid and hot. The mean monthly rainfall is 85 mm in summer and 30 to 45 mm in winter. The main crops are wheat, millet, oilseed and pulses.
AgroEcological Zone Units: Pothowar region, D.I Khan, Islamabad, Rawalpindi. Mostly rainfed agriculture prevails.
Comments En: Fertile soil guarantees good yield of garlic. Sowing should be in rows and the distance between the rows should be 6-8 inches while the distance between the plants should be 3 inches. Nitrogen is extremely necessary for garlic. In november 80 Kg ammonium sulphate or 40 Kg Urea per acre should be used. In december again use ammonium sulphate or urea in the same amount. For the third time in mid January apply 40 Kg ammonium sulphate or 20 Kg urea per acre.
Comments ES: El suelo fértil garantiza un buen rendimiento de ajo. La siembra debe estar en filas y la distancia entre las filas debe ser 6-8 pulgadas mientras que la distancia entre las plantas debe ser de 3 pulgadas. El nitrógeno es sumamente necesario para el ajo. En noviembre de 80 Kg de sulfato de amonio o 40 Urea Kg por acre debe ser utilizado. En diciembre de volver a utilizar sulfato de amonio o urea en la misma cantidad. Por tercera vez a mediados de enero aplica 40 sulfato de amonio Kg o 20 Kg de urea por acre.
Comments FR: sol Fertile garantit un bon rendement de l'ail. Ensemencement doit être en lignes et la distance entre les lignes doivent être 6-8 pouces, tandis que la distance entre les plantes doit être de 3 pouces. L'azote est extrêmement nécessaire à l'ail. En novembre 80 kg de sulfate d'ammonium ou 40 kg Urée par acre devrait être utilisé. En décembre utiliser à nouveau le sulfate d'ammonium ou de l'urée dans la même quantité. Pour la troisième fois à la mi-Janvier appliquer 40 kg de sulfate d'ammonium ou de 20 kg d'urée par acre.
Comments ZH: 肥沃的土壤保证了大蒜的产量好。播种应行与行之间的距离应为6-8英寸，而植物之间的距离应为3英寸。氮是大蒜极其必要的。在十一月80公斤硫酸铵或每英亩40公斤尿素应该被使用。在十二月再次使用硫酸铵或尿素在相同的金额。对于中期第三次申请月40公斤硫酸铵或每亩尿素20公斤。

Distance entre les plantes doivent être 6-9 pouces. La matière organique devrait être utilisé plus à cet effet, les restes des plantes doit être inhumé dans le sol.
Comments ZH: 播种应该经由钻头，使得种子可以Bé掩埋2  - 下土壤2.5英寸。各行之间的距离应为2.5英尺。工厂之间的距离应为6-9英寸。有机质应选用并为此植物的遗骸应在土壤中安葬。

Additional information: Mostly irrigation but in rainfed areas cotton is also produced.
AgroEcological Zone Description: As its name indicates, it is located in the upper part of sindh province. In Upper Sindh, the thermal equator passes through Sindh. The highest temperature recorded was 127 Degrees F in 1919. The air is generally very dry. In winter frost is common
AgroEcological Zone Practices: Mix cropping with good cotton crops.
AgroEcological Zone Units: Major cities of upper sindh are: Rohri, Sukkur, Jacobabad, Thul, Kashmore,Shikarpur etc.

Additional information: Mostly irrigation but in rainfed areas cotton is also produced.
AgroEcological Zone Description: The Lower Sindh is effected by the coastline and is damper, humid, SW winds in summer and NE winds in winter and generally the climate is maritime with rainfall little less than the Middle Sindh. The maximum temperature reaches 95-100 Degrees F. In the Kirthar range at 6,000 ft and higher on the Gorakhnath and other peaks in Dadu district, temperatures near freezing have been recorded and brief snow fall is received in winters.
AgroEcological Zone Practices: Lower Sindh has a damper and humid maritime climate affected by the south-western winds in summer and north-eastern winds in winter and with lower rainfall than central Sindh.

Additional information: Reccommended varieties are:BR-99, BR-90

Comments ZH: 第一次灌水应播种后3周给予。
